name: DICK(dog is cute ok)
description:
This is a submission for the Black and White Jam hosted by MYline media

Carry the Dog to the Exit to Win. Some Enemies might Attack You and Your Dog, So Stick Together to Stay Safe.

Controls : 

Movement : WASD / Arrow keys / D-pad

Jump(Confirm) : J / Z / A / Cross

Use : K / X / X / Square

Pick/Drop(Reject) : L / C / B / Circle

Pause : Esc / Start / Options

Audio :

I promise it's better on windows version, Godot seems to have some problems with audio in html, either that or it's my problem. But since this is a jam game I'm gonna pretend I hear nothing wrong, please pretend with me.
